AltName.entry: COMMUNITY ASSESSMENT AND REHABILITATION TEAM (CART) (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Helps people to return home from hospital as quickly as possible or to remain at home during a period of ill health. Most people are aged 65 years and over, and could be recovering from a fall and at risk of falling again, have a chest or urine infection or be dehydrated. The team is divided into groups South and North. Takes referrals from GPs, district nurses, community matron, hospital staff and emergency care practitioners.
